data.title: Azerothian Archives - New World Event in Patch 10.2.5
data.meta_description: The Azerothian Archives is a new World Event arriving in Patch 10.2.5 Seeds of Renewal, in which you'll be exploring the Dragon Isles's past by doing archaeology-esque activities in a new weekly event and world quests! In this guide, we tell you everything that there is to know about the Azerothian Archives, including what to do and rewards to obtain from the event.
data.text:
AchievementRewardRequirement

The Archives Called, You AnsweredTitle: Complete all the achivements below.

Tenured Archivist--Earn max reputation (Tenured) with the Azerothian Archives.

When a Rock is Just a Rock--During Excavation World Quests, gather 10 Just a Rock.

Goggle Wobble--During Technoscrying World Quests, /dance with Zenata while wearing the Technoscryers in all 3 locations: Igira's Watch, Dragonskull Island and Concord Observatory.

Clued In--During Research world quests, located buried artifacts to spawn Infomation-Stuffed Clues 10 times.

Relic Rescuer--During Big Dig events, recover relics for Eadweard by digging near him while awaiting for orders.

Tome Comber--During Big Dig events, recover tomes by filling bar pages by digging for relics and completing orders. The tomes awarded are random.

Finally At RestHap'heAcquire the story surrounding Traitor's Rest by completing the Weekly quest The Big Dig: Traitor's Rest six times.

Just One More ThingReeseAcquire the story surrounding all 7 solo dig sites by completing Azerothian Archives quests at each location a number of times. Current number is currently unknown.
